title: minerjones
author: minerjones
created_time: December 25, 2022, 12:34:16 PMLast edit: January 05, 2023, 02:03:30 PM by minerjones
content: A fun twist on the 12 Days of Christmas comes:THE 12 DAYS OF CRYPTOMAS(brought to you by Satoshi Nakamoto) ¬†Each day for the next 12 days, we will add another set of great raffle prizes...but counting down to the last day where there will be 1 final prize.There is a total of 78 prizes, so many will win.It is free to enter, 1 slot per person, but people can win more than once with their 1 slot.We will roll the blockchain on the last day of CryptoMas on January 5thI would expect this to fill by then at only 100 slots.On the 1st day of Cryptomas, Satoshi gave to me: 12 golden BTC lapel pinsOn the 2nd day of Cryptomas, Satoshi gave to me: 11 golden BTC decks of playing cardsOn the 3rd day of Cryptomas, Satoshi gave to me: 10 golden BTC challenge coins (4.6oz!!)On the 4th day of Cryptomas, Satoshi gave to me: 9 golden BTC cufflink setsOn the 5th day of Cryptomas, Satoshi gave to me: 8 BTC dice setsOn the 6th day of Cryptomas, Satoshi gave to me: 7 Papersafe BTC Savings BondsOn the 7th day of Cryptomas, Satoshi gave to me: 6 BTC comic booksOn the 8th day of Cryptomas, Satoshi gave to me: 5 BTC fork-pens and cut-out coinsOn the 9th day of Cryptomas, Satoshi gave to me: 4 BTC pairs of socksOn the 10th day of Cryptomas, Satoshi gave to me: 3 BTC LED lampsOn the 11th day of Cryptomas, Satoshi gave to me: 2 BTCYOB sets of coinsOn the 12th day of Cryptomas, Satoshi gave to me: 1 Cardsmiths base set + Elon Crystal Sparkle + 1 unopened box of cards!!
